text: so one time, sometime, in here, someone posted, for console, JS to get the headers in the HubDB to be stickied to the page when scrolling, anyone have that?
I can just change them to have them pinned as default
that would be wonderful. I know scrolling through hundreds of rows and then having to scroll back up because i dont know what column i am in now is a headache
can there be a boolean in the settings modal like "Pin Headers"
I think it should just be pinned as default
Or would there be a case you wouldn't want them pinned?
not really, i think pinning by default is a great idea, just wasnt sure if others would want it
<@U6GNQ7JBU> let me know when you get those pinned, then I'll hop in there and work my stuff lol
Yea just need to fix a bug and I'll push it out
Should be up in a few minutes. I believe there is (but can't find) a UI bug with this change, so let me know if you see anything unusual :eyes:
when horizontal scrolling it doesnt show the other columns
DM'd you a screen of it
